remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管某些区域使用不同的月份名称，在大多数国家/地区讲波斯语，使用波斯历。The Persian calendar is used in most countries where Persian is spoken, although some regions use different month names. 波斯历官方日历伊朗和阿富汗，而是一个可选日历处于哈萨克斯坦塔吉克斯坦等区域。The Persian calendar is the official calendar of Iran and Afghanistan, and it is one of the alternative calendars in regions such as Kazakhstan and Tajikistan. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 从的 Hijra，对应于 622 年开始日期与波斯历日期公元Dates in the Persian calendar start from the year of the Hijra, which corresponds to 622 C.E. 和当穆罕默德 (PBUH) 从麦加迁移到麦地那的年份。and is the year when Muhammad (PBUH) migrated from Mecca to Medina. 例如，日期公元 2002 年 3 月 21 日For example, the date March 21, 2002 C.E. 对应于月的年份中的第一天 1381 Anno Persico。corresponds to the first day of the month of Farvardeen in the year 1381 Anno Persico. 波斯历基于太阳年，并为大约为 365 天长。The Persian calendar is based on a solar year and is approximately 365 days long. 每一年循环访问四个季节，并为新一年开始到北半球时从地球的中心从南半球半球越过赤道太阳出现。A year cycles through four seasons, and a new year begins when the sun appears to cross the equator from the southern hemisphere to the northern hemisphere as viewed from the center of the Earth. 新的一年标记月，这是在北半球 spring 的第一天的第一天中。The new year marks the first day of the month of Farvardeen, which is the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere. 每个与波斯历前六个月有 31 天、 每个接下来的五个月有 30 天，和上个月有 29 天在平 30 年天闰年中。Each of the first six months in the Persian calendar has 31 days, each of the next five months has 30 days, and the last month has 29 days in a common year and 30 days in a leap year. 闰年是每一年，被 33 除时，具有余数为 1、 5、 9、 13、 17、 22、 26 或 30。A leap year is a year that, when divided by 33, has a remainder of 1, 5, 9, 13, 17, 22, 26, or 30. 例如，1370 年是闰年，因为它被 33 除时余数为 17。For example, the year 1370 is a leap year because dividing it by 33 yields a remainder of 17. 在每个 33 年周期中有大约为 8 个闰年。There are approximately eight leap years in every 33-year cycle. ## 波斯历类和.NET Framework 版本The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]、类使用回历太阳能天文算法而不是见习算法用于计算日期。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the class uses the Hijri solar astronomical algorithm rather than an observational algorithm to calculate dates. 这使得与波斯历在伊朗和阿富汗，波斯历处于最广泛使用的两个国家/地区中使用一致的实现。This makes the implementation consistent with the Persian calendar in use in Iran and Afghanistan, the two countries in which the Persian calendar is in most widespread use. 此更改将影响所有在.NET Framework 4 或更高版本的 if 上运行的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]安装。The change affects all apps running on the .NET Framework 4 or later if the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] is installed. 由于已更改的算法：As a result of the changed algorithm: - 转换 1800年和公历日历中的 2123年之间的日期时，这两种算法应返回相同的结果。The two algorithms should return identical results when converting dates between 1800 and 2123 in the Gregorian calendar. - 当转换日期 1800年之前和之后 2123 公历日历中，两种算法可能会返回不同的结果。The two algorithms may return different results when converting dates before 1800 and after 2123 in the Gregorian calendar. - 属性值已更改从 0622 年 3 月 21，以公历为 0622 年 3 月 22，公历日历中。The property value has changed from March 21, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar to March 22, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar. - 属性值已从与波斯历 9378 年 10 月的第 10 天更改为与波斯历 9378 年 10 月的 13 天。The property value has changed from the 10th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar to the 13th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar. - 方法比以前可能返回不同的结果。The method may return a different result than it did previously. ## 使用的波斯历类Using the PersianCalendar class 应用程序使用来计算日期与波斯历日期或将公历日期与波斯日期相互转换的对象。Applications use a object to calculate dates in the Persian calendar or convert Persian dates to and from Gregorian dates. 不能使用对象作为某个区域性的默认日历。You cannot use a object as the default calendar for a culture. 指定的默认日历属性，并且必须返回的日历之一属性。The default calendar is specified by the property and must be one of the calendars returned by the property. 目前，类不是支持的任何区域性的可选日历类，因此不能为默认日历。Currently, the class is not an optional calendar for any culture supported by the class and consequently cannot be a default calendar. ## Examples
